lexa.core.data

Class BaseDataValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • lexa.core.data.BaseDataValue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<DataValue>, DataFactoryItem, DataValue
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArrayDataValue, ConfigDataValue, HashDataValue

    public abstract class BaseDataValue
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataValue
    Provide the type safe getters for a value.

    This provides the getters for the specific types supported. It does not implement the basic getValue method

    Since:
    2016-01
    Author:
    william
